name: ThePowerOfWhat
description:
The Power of What...

...is a puzzle and easy platformer meta-game.

CONTROLS (mouse+keyboard):

  • left = A or Q or left arrow
  • right = D or right arrow
  • jump = spacebar
  • clic = left clic

I will probably do a mini polish update later and plan to release a windows download,  Let me know how it goes!

Have fun :)

Ressources:

  • made with gamemaker
  • music made with OpenMpt
  • Montserrat open font
  • sounds generated with SFXR http://drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
